characters.name: Mine Slave
characters.description: A slave working in the silver mines, hearing distant tales of Rome's politics and wars.

characters.name: Mine Overseer
characters.description: A harsh taskmaster who ensures quotas are met. He occasionally shares news from Rome.

characters.name: Traveling Merchant
characters.description: Visits the mines to trade goods. Brings news and rumors from across the Republic.

characters.name: Lucius Cornelius Sulla
characters.description: A Roman general and politician known for his military prowess and ambition. Recipient of the Grass Crown.
